message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a fantastic deal for you at a price of $180.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I'm looking to keep my expenses lower. Would you consider $160 for the product?
I understand you're looking to keep expenses lower, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $170.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. How about we aim for $165? This would be a fair compromise for both of us.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can do $175, but that's as low as I can go.
I see where you're coming from, Alice. Let's try $170. This would be a win-win for both of us.
I've been flexible so far, but I really need to make a profit. I can do $178, but that's my final offer.
I respect your position, Alice. How about $175? This would be the best compromise considering our previous discussions.
I've been very flexible, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can do $179, but that's it. No more negotiations.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our previous offers, how about we settle at $177? This would be a fair compromise.
